thread.title: Beyonce's Best Maternity Throwback Looks | InStyle.com
thread.title_full: Beyonce's Best Maternity Throwback Looks | InStyle.com

author: Isabel Jones
title: Beyonce's Best Maternity Throwback Looks | InStyle.com
text:
Jason Merritt/Getty 1. August 28, 2011 
Bey arrived at the 2011 Video Music Awards in this billowing burnt orange gown, cradling the bump she'd officially debut later in the evening. Kristian Dowling/PictureGroup 2. August 28, 2011 
The world debut of Baby bump Blue! Yoncé gave the public its first glimpse of her pregnant belly while belting "Love on Top" at the 2011 VMAs in a glittery purple blazer and high-waisted trousers. Mike Coppola/Getty 
Mrs. Carter glittered in gold during Mercedes-Benz fashion week. Michael Buckner/Getty 
The chart-topping singer skillfully hid her bump beneath a flouncy thigh-brushing mini dress. Jemal Countess/WireImage 
Bey showed off a sliver of ribcage in this empire-waisted floor-length gown. 6. September 18, 2011 
Bey's first pregnancy didn't keep her from flashing some skin. The Destiny's Child alum was absolutely glowing when she stepped out in this plunging sequined jumpsuit. Kevin Mazur/WireImage 7. September 21, 2011 
Bey bared some serious leg and drew attention to her burgeoning bump in a metallic mini dress. Taylor Hill/FilmMagic
